item.description:
Lorraine Hurley MD

ENERGY MEDICINE: What it is and what it can do for you

  • Energy medicine works by strengthening and harmonizing life force
  • Life force is a primary determinant of health and well-being
  • A living and plant based diet helps maximize life force
  • A strong and harmonized life force/energy body helps us thrive at all levels of our humanity
  • A competent understanding of our energy body guides us towards the creation of a transformative change in our lives
  • Energy medicine therefore assists us in reaching our full potential as human beings

Please join us at Prana Cafe, May 23, 2012 @ 6pm (dinner)

Lecture 6:30-8pm followed by Q&A

Admission fee $10

292 Center St. Newton, MA 02458

617.527.772, www.eatatprana.com

Public parking on Pearl and Jefferson Streets

You may attend without purchasing dinner. Those that wish to enjoy Prana cuisine will receive a 15% discount on all menu items (excluding alcohol). Reservations are recommended, as seating is limited. Prana Cafe and Optimum Health Solution jointly sponsor this event. 20% of proceeds are donated to the non-profit, Real Kids Real Food., www.realkidsrealfood.com.

Lorraine Hurley is a scientifically oriented MD with substantial self-directed continuing education and experience in the field of holistic, functional, environmental, nutritional and energetic medicine. She is a certified quantum biofeedback specialist and functional physician.

“I am a visionary that holds the belief that the medicine of the future will be based on the science of progressive physics and what it is teaching us about human abilities and potential. I am an avid researcher and student of the "quantum age" with a distinct ability to synthesize complex information and translate it into practical communication and application. I particularly enjoy working with groups and am an advocate of empowering others towards greater personal responsibility in the care of their health as a means of living a more satisfying, harmonious and creative life.”
item.name: ENERGY MEDICINE: What it is and what it can do for you
